products.heroText: Get Your E-Rickshaw Loan in {city} – Start Earning Today!
products.heroSubtext: Quick approval, minimal documents. Become your own boss with affordable EMIs.

faqs.question: What is the interest rate for E-Rickshaw loan in {city}?
faqs.answer: Our E-Rickshaw loans in {city} start at just 9.99% p.a. The exact rate depends on your profile and credit score.

faqs.question: How much loan amount can I get for E-Rickshaw?
faqs.answer: You can get E-Rickshaw loan from ₹50,000 to ₹2,00,000 based on your income and repayment capacity.

faqs.question: What documents are required for E-Rickshaw loan?
faqs.answer: Basic documents required are Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, Driving License, 6 months bank statement, and address proof.

faqs.question: How long does loan approval take?
faqs.answer: With complete documents, you can get approval within 24-48 hours. Many applications are approved same day.

faqs.question: Can I apply without a driving license?
faqs.answer: A valid driving license is mandatory for E-Rickshaw loan. You need license valid for transport vehicles.

products.heroText: Electric Scooter Loan in {city} – Go Green, Save More!
products.heroSubtext: Finance your electric two-wheeler with low EMIs and instant approval.

faqs.question: What is the minimum down payment for EV two-wheeler loan?
faqs.answer: We offer zero down payment options for eligible customers. Standard down payment is 10-15% of vehicle cost.

faqs.question: Which EV brands are covered under this loan?
faqs.answer: All major EV brands including Ola, Ather, TVS iQube, Bajaj Chetak, Hero Electric, and more are covered.

faqs.question: Can delivery partners apply for this loan?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have special schemes for Zomato, Swiggy, and other delivery partners with easy documentation.

faqs.question: What is the EMI for ₹1 lakh EV loan?
faqs.answer: For ₹1 lakh loan at 8.99% for 36 months, EMI is approximately ₹3,180. Use our EMI calculator for exact amount.

faqs.question: Is there any subsidy benefit on EV loans?
faqs.answer: Yes, government FAME-II subsidy benefits are applicable. We help you avail all available subsidies in {city}.

products.heroText: Home Loan in {city} – Make Your Dream Home a Reality!
products.heroSubtext: Affordable interest rates, long tenure options, and hassle-free processing.

faqs.question: What is the current home loan interest rate in {city}?
faqs.answer: Home loan interest rates in {city} start from 8.50% p.a. Rate varies based on credit score and loan amount.

faqs.question: How much home loan can I get on ₹50,000 salary?
faqs.answer: With ₹50,000 monthly salary, you can typically get home loan up to ₹35-40 lakhs depending on other obligations.

faqs.question: What is the maximum tenure for home loan?
faqs.answer: Maximum tenure is 30 years (360 months), subject to retirement age. Longer tenure means lower EMI.

faqs.question: Can I get home loan for under-construction property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we finance under-construction properties from approved builders. Disbursement is linked to construction progress.

faqs.question: What are the tax benefits on home loan?
faqs.answer: You get tax deduction up to ₹1.5 lakh on principal (80C) and ₹2 lakh on interest (24b) annually.

products.heroText: Business Loan in {city} – Grow Your Business Today!
products.heroSubtext: Quick unsecured loans for your business expansion, inventory, or working capital needs.

faqs.question: What is the minimum turnover required for business loan?
faqs.answer: Minimum annual turnover of ₹10 lakhs is required. Higher turnover helps in getting larger loan amounts.

faqs.question: Can I get business loan without collateral?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer unsecured business loans up to ₹50 lakhs without any collateral or security.

faqs.question: How soon can I get business loan disbursed?
faqs.answer: With complete documentation, business loans can be disbursed within 48-72 hours of approval.

faqs.question: Is GST registration mandatory for business loan?
faqs.answer: GST registration is required for loans above ₹10 lakhs. Smaller amounts may be approved without GST.

faqs.question: Can new businesses apply for loan in {city}?
faqs.answer: Business should be operational for minimum 2 years. New businesses can explore our startup loan schemes.

products.heroText: Loan Against Property in {city} – Unlock Your Property's Value!
products.heroSubtext: Get high-value secured loans at lowest interest rates using your property.

faqs.question: How much loan can I get against my property?
faqs.answer: You can get up to 70% of your property's market value. Actual amount depends on property type and location.

faqs.question: Can I get LAP on commercial property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer loans against both residential and commercial properties. Commercial property may get up to 60% LTV.

faqs.question: What can I use Loan Against Property for?
faqs.answer: LAP funds can be used for any purpose - business expansion, education, medical expenses, or debt consolidation.

faqs.question: Will I lose ownership of my property?
faqs.answer: No, you retain full ownership and possession. Property is only mortgaged as security until loan is repaid.

faqs.question: What is the interest rate for LAP in {city}?
faqs.answer: LAP interest rates start from 9.50% p.a. in {city}. Actual rate depends on property value and your profile.

products.heroText: Personal Loan in {city} – Instant Cash for Your Needs!
products.heroSubtext: No collateral, no questions asked. Get funds for any personal requirement.

faqs.question: What is the minimum salary required for personal loan?
faqs.answer: Minimum monthly salary of ₹20,000 is required for personal loan. Higher salary qualifies for larger amounts.

faqs.question: How fast can I get personal loan disbursed?
faqs.answer: With digital documentation, personal loans can be disbursed within 24 hours of approval.

faqs.question: Can self-employed persons apply for personal loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, self-employed individuals can apply with ITR and bank statements as income proof.

faqs.question: What is the maximum personal loan amount in {city}?
faqs.answer: Maximum personal loan amount is ₹25 lakhs, subject to income and credit score eligibility.

faqs.question: Are there any prepayment charges?
faqs.answer: Prepayment charges vary by lender. Many offer zero prepayment charges after 6 months of regular payments.

products.heroText: Car Loan in {city} – Drive Your Dream Car Home!
products.heroSubtext: Lowest interest rates on new and pre-owned cars with quick approval.

faqs.question: What is the interest rate for car loan in {city}?
faqs.answer: Car loan interest rates start from 8.75% p.a. Rate depends on car model, loan tenure, and your credit profile.

faqs.question: Can I get 100% car loan without down payment?
faqs.answer: Yes, 100% on-road funding is available for eligible customers with good credit score and stable income.

faqs.question: What is the maximum tenure for car loan?
faqs.answer: Maximum car loan tenure is 7 years (84 months). Longer tenure means lower EMI but higher total interest.

faqs.question: Can I get loan for used car?
faqs.answer: Yes, we finance pre-owned cars up to 5 years old. Interest rate for used cars is slightly higher.

faqs.question: Is car insurance mandatory for car loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, comprehensive car insurance is mandatory for financed vehicles. Insurance can be included in loan.

products.heroText: Two Wheeler Loan in {city} – Ride Home Your Favorite Bike!
products.heroSubtext: Easy finance for bikes and scooters with instant approval and low EMI.

faqs.question: What is the minimum down payment for two-wheeler loan?
faqs.answer: Minimum down payment is typically 10-15% of bike cost. Zero down payment available for select customers.

faqs.question: Can students apply for two-wheeler loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, students with parent as co-applicant can apply for two-wheeler loan with parent's income proof.

faqs.question: Which bike brands are covered under loan?
faqs.answer: All major brands like Honda, Hero, TVS, Bajaj, Royal Enfield, Yamaha, Suzuki are covered.

faqs.question: How is EMI calculated for two-wheeler loan?
faqs.answer: For ₹1 lakh loan at 9.5% for 24 months, EMI is approximately ₹4,600. Use our calculator for exact amount.

faqs.question: Can I prepay my two-wheeler loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, prepayment is allowed after 6 EMIs. Some lenders offer zero prepayment charges.

products.heroText: Commercial Vehicle Loan in {city} – Grow Your Transport Business!
products.heroSubtext: Finance for trucks, tempos, buses, and commercial vehicles at best rates.

faqs.question: What vehicles are covered under commercial vehicle loan?
faqs.answer: All commercial vehicles including trucks, tempos, mini trucks, buses, tippers, and three-wheelers are covered.

faqs.question: Can first-time buyers get commercial vehicle loan?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have special schemes for first-time commercial vehicle buyers with slightly higher down payment.

faqs.question: What is the loan amount for Tata Ace in {city}?
faqs.answer: For Tata Ace, loan amount up to ₹4-5 lakhs is available covering 85-90% of on-road price.

faqs.question: Can I get loan for used commercial vehicle?
faqs.answer: Yes, used commercial vehicles up to 7 years old can be financed at competitive rates.

faqs.question: Is permit required for commercial vehicle loan?
faqs.answer: Permit is not required at loan stage but will be needed for vehicle registration and operation.

products.heroText: Education Loan in {city} – Fund Your Future Today!
products.heroSubtext: Study in India or abroad with affordable education financing.

faqs.question: What expenses are covered under education loan?
faqs.answer: Education loan covers tuition fees, hostel charges, books, equipment, travel, and other education-related expenses.

faqs.question: When do I start repaying education loan?
faqs.answer: Repayment starts 6-12 months after course completion or getting a job, whichever is earlier (moratorium period).

faqs.question: Is collateral required for education loan?
faqs.answer: Loans up to ₹7.5 lakhs are typically collateral-free. Higher amounts may require property as security.

faqs.question: Can I get education loan for foreign university?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer education loans for studying abroad in recognized universities across USA, UK, Canada, Australia, etc.

faqs.question: What is the tax benefit on education loan?
faqs.answer: Interest paid on education loan qualifies for tax deduction under Section 80E with no upper limit.
